attributes.action: Make the police clearly display their officer number both on the front and back of their jackets at all times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
following the events of the G20 protests it has become clear that the police can at times use excessive force and even launch unprovoked attacks

This type of behavior is not acceptable however due to their being no way to identify a officer in riot gear despite video evidence of the events no prosecutions will ever be possible 

The police are not above the law the police should be made to clearly display their officer number on the back and front of his/her jacket in order to allow a officer to be identified should he/she behave inappropriately

This would allow justice to be done and prevent more cases where a officer is not disciplined because he/she has no identifying features on display

It would also help restore public confidence in the police
